Ultimately, with my Restoring Community Input & Public Protections in Oil & Gas Leasing Act, we can reduce greenhouse gas emissions AND protect the environment, private landowners, and taxpayer interests.

Myth: Eliminating noncompetitive leasing will hurt taxpayers and states.

Fact: Noncompetitive leasing is an outdated process that lets companies acquire vast tracks of public lands for less than a cup of ‚òï.

Myth: Companies disclose enough information, and citizens have more than enough ways to engage in the leasing process.

Fact: Companies nominate public lands for auction anonymously and with no fee. My bill fixes this.

Myth: Restricting U.S. oil & gas drilling is worse for the environment.

Fact: Reducing consumption of fossil fuels is the best thing we can do to protect our planet. We should focus on clean energy solutions instead of drilling for more oil.

This prohibits ‚Äúproduct hopping,‚Äù an anticompetitive practice by which brand-name pharmaceuticals seek to extend their exclusivity on an expiring patented drug by...
